languages.text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} атакует противник, следующая атака воина {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} против этого противника наносит +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно. Эффект не суммируется, но после новой атаки любого противника может быть активирован снова.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the Fighter, the Fighter's next melee attack against that enemy deals an additional <u>(TOU Bonus)</u> Damage. Does not stack but can be reactivated after another attack made by the same or a different enemy.

Whenever an enemy attacks the Fighter, the Fighter's next melee attack against that enemy deals an additional +<u>TGH Bonus</u> damage. Does not stack but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

Whenever an enemy attacks the Fighter, the Fighter's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} damage. Does not stack but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воина{/g} атакует противник, следующая атака воина {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}в ближнем бою{/g} против этого противника наносит +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно. Эффект не суммируется, но после новой атаки любого противника может быть активирован снова.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the Fighter, the Fighter's next melee attack against that enemy deals an additional +<u>TGH Bonus</u> damage. Does not stack but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: Когда бойца атакует противник, следующая атака бойца в ближнем бою против этого противника наносит +<u>бонус ВЫН</u> урона дополнительно. Эффект не суммируется, но после новой атаки любого противника может быть активирован снова.

Когда бойца атакует противник, следующая атака бойца в ближнем бою против этого противника наносит +<u>бонус ВЫН</u> урона дополнительно. Эффект не суммируется, но после новой атаки любого противника может быть активирован снова.

Когда бойца атакует противник, следующая атака бойца в ближнем бою против этого противника наносит +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} урона дополнительно. Эффект не суммируется, но после новой атаки любого противника может быть активирован снова.

languages.text: 每当有敌人攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}时，战士对该名敌人下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}额外造成{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。此效果无法叠加，但发动效果后若再次被敌人攻击，可再次激活此效果。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: 每当有敌人攻击战士时，战士对该名敌人下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成额外伤害，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。此效果无法叠加，但发动效果后若再次被敌人攻击，可再次激活此效果。
每当有敌人攻击战士时，战士对该名敌人下次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}造成额外伤害，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}。此效果无法叠加，但发动效果后若再次被敌人攻击，可再次激活此效果。

languages.text: 敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}を攻撃するたび、ファイターのその敵に対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}には追加で＋{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が付与される。これは累積しないが、同じ敵あるいは別の敵による新たな攻撃の後に再度有効になる。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: 敵がファイターを攻撃するたび、ファイターのその敵に対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}には追加で＋<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>ダメージが付与される。これは累積しないが、同じ敵あるいは別の敵による新たな攻撃の後に再度有効になる。
敵がファイターを攻撃するたび、ファイターのその敵に対する次の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}には追加で＋{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}ダメージが付与される。これは累積しないが、同じ敵あるいは別の敵による新たな攻撃の後に再度有効になる。

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo ataca al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g}, su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra ese enemigo inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional. No se acumula, pero se puede reactivar después de recibir otro ataque de ese enemigo o de otro distinto.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo ataca al guerrero, su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra ese enemigo inflige +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> de daño adicional. No se acumula, pero se puede reactivar después de recibir otro ataque de ese enemigo o de otro distinto.

Cada vez que un enemigo ataca al guerrero, su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra ese enemigo inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} de daño adicional. No se acumula, pero se puede reactivar después de recibir otro ataque de ese enemigo o de otro distinto.

languages.text: Wenn ein Feind den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} angreift, verursacht der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kriegers gegen diesen Feind zusätzlich +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Dieser Effekt ist nicht stapelbar, kann aber nach einem weiteren Angriff desselben oder eines anderen Feindes erneut aktiviert werden.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Gegner den Kämpfer angreift, verursacht der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kämpfers gegen diesen Gegner zusätzlichen +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> Schaden. Dies lässt sich nicht aufaddieren, kann aber nach einem weiteren Angriff desselben oder eines anderen Gegners erneut aktiviert werden.

Immer wenn ein Gegner den Kämpfer angreift, verursacht der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des Kämpfers gegen diesen Gegner zusätzlichen +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} Schaden. Dies lässt sich nicht aufaddieren, kann aber nach einem weiteren Angriff desselben oder eines anderen Gegners erneut aktiviert werden.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante que lance le guerrier contre cet ennemi inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en plus. Non cumulable, mais réactivable après une autre attaque lancée par le même ennemi ou un autre.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque le Combattant, l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante que lance le Combattant contre cet ennemi inflige +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> points de dégâts en plus. Non cumulable mais réactivable après une autre attaque lancée par le même ennemi ou un autre.

Chaque fois qu'un ennemi attaque le Combattant, l'{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} suivante que lance le Combattant contre cet ennemi inflige +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} points de dégâts en plus. Non cumulable mais réactivable après une autre attaque lancée par le même ennemi ou un autre.

languages.text: Bir düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}'ya saldırdığında Savaşçı'nın o düşmana karşı bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir. Üst üste birikmez ancak aynı veya farklı bir düşman tarafından yapılacak yeni bir saldırının ardından tekrar etkinleştirilebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy attacks the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}, the Warrior's next {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against that enemy deals an additional +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Does not stack, but it can be reactivated after another attack made by either the same enemy or a different one.
